body:
So, I used this to do dashboarding for recipe-history.

Not sure if there is an ask, but I am definitely ready to talk through the
in-flight work.  I made my own tools, and I have some sense of real
questions I have asked.

I am also quite fine with moving / promoting a lot of things we do in jexl
(including sampling) into "1st class" things that don't require traversal.

GL

Project work at:
http://www.github.com/gregglind/x-shield-inflight-dashboard

body_html:
So, I used this to do dashboarding for recipe-history. Not sure if there is an ask, but I am definitely ready to talk through the in-flight work. I made my own tools, and I have some sense of real questions I have asked. I am also quite fine with moving / promoting a lot of things we do in jexl (including sampling) into "1st class" things that don't require traversal. GL Project work at: http://www.github.com/gregglind/x-shield-inflight-dashboard
